Block.Text: {C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You're back, {Name}{C1}? Not the type to learn your lesson, eh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Maybe this time my {Color:30}Shinx{Color:33} will make things clearer for you!{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}That was a fine contest.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}Violight{Color:33} Castle is yours to use as you see fit.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You don't mind?{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}No. My conscience is clear.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}This battle did not bring shame upon our family name.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}We protected our honor, and that is all that matters.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You continue to underestimate me, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}No matter how many times you try, you will never conquer {Color:30}Violight{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, {Color:30}Chrysalia{Color:33} is a kingdom that contains a lot of Bug-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Fire-type, Flying-type, and Rock-type Pokémon will be pretty effective there...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}But Grass-type and Psychic-type Pokémon will probably find it tough going.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Chrysalia{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ohh! Pokémari is just such glorious fun!{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Yoshimoto{Color:33}, someone has come to challenge you to battle!{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And little {Color:30}Pineco{Color:33} just gets more adorable every day! Ohh!{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}LORD {Color:30}YOSHIMOTO{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}OHH!{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Your opponent in battle is to be {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}? Is that the one who's been expanding his territory in the north? Or the other one?{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ohh, it doesn't matter. As long as they want to play Pokémari with me, I don't care who they are!{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Yoshimoto{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Come, {Name}{C1}! To the battlefield, where we shall play Pokémari to our hearts' content!{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ohh! Back for some more Pokémari, are you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}What's that? You want to do battle, not Pokémari?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Well, all right. Battles can be quite enjoyable too!{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ohh, so the battle's over. No more fun...{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Yoshimoto{Color:33}, you must understand. As a result of losing this battle...{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You are no longer the Warlord of {Color:30}Chrysalia{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ohh? Ohh...{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}...OHH!{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ahem...{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Now the battle's over, how about a game of Pokémari?{End}
{C1}{Char:0013}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Ohh, come on, {Name}{C1}, you'll have a little game...{End}
{C1}{Char:0145}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}LORD YOSHIMOTO{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Congratulations, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You now have seven kingdoms under your control!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Are you always this pleased with yourselves?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...Ah!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Surely you are aware of the crisis facing Ransei as we speak...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Meanwhile...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Nobunaga, who had been gathering his forces in the north of {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}, had conquered eight kingdoms himself.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Just two kingdoms remained:{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Terrera, under Shingen's command, and Illusio, Kenshin's kingdom.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Both were renowned throughout {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33} as {Color:34}Warlords{Color:33} of great strength.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Indeed, even Nobunaga himself was said to fear them...{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:33}So... What if {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} captured those two kingdoms?{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Th-That would be terrible! Nobody would be able to stop him then!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}So do I have to say what we're all thinking? {C1}...I guess I do.{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}, you've got to get {Color:30}Shingen{Color:33} and {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33} on your side. There are no other options...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You are now able to challenge the Warlords of {Color:30}Terrera{Color:33} and {Color:30}Illusio{Color:33} to battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}It's finally time, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Shingen{Color:33}'s army has Ground-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}And Warriors partnered with all sorts of other Pokémon, too.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}There's no doubt about it―we're in for a tough fight.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Terrera{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Well, well, if it isn't {Name}{C1}. I've heard rumors about you...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}What brings you here, anyway? You wish to challenge me to a battle?{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hahaha! You?! Challenging me to a battle?! Oh, very amusing! Very amusing indeed!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Wh-Wha―?! |02,cc{C1} is serious!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Oh, yes, of course... I'm sorry... It's just the thought of it...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You know, I'd be happy to do battle...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But you're just no match for me at the moment, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Though there is one here...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Uh... Never mind.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Come back when you've toughened up a bit, all right, {Name}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Wh-What?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}So, |02,cc{C1}... We're going to be challenging the army of {Color:30}Illusio{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33}'s army has lots of Warriors who are partnered with Psychic-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}And they're all pretty skillful.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}We mustn't let our guard down!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Illusio{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So, {Name}{C1}... You wish to challenge me in battle...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Alas...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Your abilities are not yet comparable to mine.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}It would not be wise for me to indulge the request of one so weak.{End}
{C1}{Char:0026}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33} has spoken.{End}
{C1}{Char:0026}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Should you truly wish to face him in battle, you must grow stronger first.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Wh-What?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}What are we going to do, |02,cc{C1}? While we're wasting time here, {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} is probably...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}|02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Warriors from {Color:30}Terrera{Color:33} are attacking our kingdom!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Warriors from {Color:30}Illusio{Color:33} are attacking our kingdom!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You are the one they call {Name}{C1}, are you not?{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}The one who so unwisely attempted to invade {Color:30}Illusio{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Enthusiasm is meaningless if you do not have the requisite talent, after all.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I am here to measure the extent of your strength.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}To see whether you would really be a match for {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You have returned, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Then let us do battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Very impressive, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}The love you feel toward your Pokémon is plain to see.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Now, you are strong enough...{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I believe dear Kenshin will agree to do battle with you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I, for one, am looking forward to it.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I am lost for words.{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Is this really all you are capable of, {Name}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}You disappoint me greatly.{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}|02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}My name is {Color:30}Yukimura{Color:33}. I am pleased to make your acquaintance.{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I'm here on Lord {Color:30}Shingen{Color:33}'s orders.{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I believe it has something to do with that visit you paid to {Color:30}Terrera{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I am here to challenge you to battle!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Come―to the battlefield!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}So you wish to do battle again, {Name}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}I am honored that you would think of me first.{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I shall repay you on the battlefield!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Well done, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}The way you worked together with your Pokémon... It was very impressive.{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I shall have to try my best to match your standard, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Farewell for now!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Thank you for the battle...{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But I'm sure you can do better than that, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}Otherwise, you really are no match for me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Unbelievable... Powerful Warriors like that, here in our kingdom!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You know, I really thought we were done for when they turned up...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But you saved the day, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}|02,cc{C1}...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}{Name}{C1}... You look... What on earth...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Are you...? Is this...? Warrior transformation...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I remember hearing about this... Much like Pokémon can evolve...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Warriors are capable of transforming!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I have only heard of a few instances of this ever happening before in all of Ransei.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But legend has it that Warriors become much more powerful when they transform!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Maybe now you'll be strong enough to take on {Color:30}Shingen{Color:33} and {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33}, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, {Color:30}Shingen{Color:33} uses Ground-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Remember that Electric-type Pokémon's attacks have no effect on Ground-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}And don't forget that he has lots of other Pokémon types in his army, too.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}! I've been waiting for you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Hmm? You look...different.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Well, well. I do think this battle is going to be fun. Don't you, {Color:30}Yukimura{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Most definitely. If |02,cc{C1} is our opponent, then I shall give it everything I have!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Yes... So, shall we begin?{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You look enthusiastic as ever, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Perhaps I'll have to start taking you seriously...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hmm! Fine work indeed.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}You defeated me, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}My deepest apologies. If I had just―{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Forget it, {Color:30}Yukimura{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Winning this battle was never my intention.{End}
{C1}{Char:0024}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Huh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I was always planning to join young {Name}{C1} here.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}As was I.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So there you are. I thought you might show up.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Anyone strong enough to defeat my nemesis is worthy of my service.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}From now on, I shall fight for your army, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}|02,cc{C1}! This is great news!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Still too early for you to be taking me on, eh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Well, be sure to try again soon. I'll be waiting, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33} uses Psychic-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Bug-type and Dark-type Pokémon would be a wise choice against him.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}But Fighting-type and Poison-type Pokémon will probably struggle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So you came, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I sense...that you are not as weak as you were.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I have been waiting for this moment.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}It is time for you to prove yourself in battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Prove that you are worthy of being my opponent!{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You returned...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Then let us do battle. It is the only way for you to become stronger.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Very impressive, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I am forced to acknowledge your talents on the battlefield.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Under your command, {Name}{C1}, my might will be of use in bringing righteousness to this world.{End}
{C1}{Char:0026}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And you, Nemesis... I know you are there. Show yourself.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I thought you might spot me there...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I watched your battle against {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33}, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And it confirmed what I've been feeling for a while. I, too, want to join your army.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}My nemesis and I, united at last...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I never thought I'd see the day!{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Neither did I...{End}
{C1}{Char:0027}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}My goodness! You look happy, {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0026}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Kenshin{Color:33} and Lord {Color:30}Shingen{Color:33} are among the most powerful Warlords in all Ransei.{End}
{C1}{Char:0026}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}To have them both fighting for your army is quite a coup, |02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}This is not good enough...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I know you can do better than this, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Come and do battle again when you are ready.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It looks like we're heading for all-out war with {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} for control of Ransei.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Indeed. We will face battles more difficult than any we have experienced before...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Yeah... But before all that...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}I've made us something to eat! Go ahead, enjoy!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Ahh! This does look tasty. How considerate of you!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Very well, let's have ourselves a little feast in celebration, shall we?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Knowing that a showdown with Nobunaga was not far away,{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}'s army resolved to take this fleeting moment to relax and enjoy themselves.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Their merriment did not last long, however...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The short life of man is nothing compared to the age of this world. It is but a fleeting dream, an illusion...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}B-Brother?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...?!{End}
